items.content_html: Nodex is a lightweight Node.js framework designed to accelerate development while adhering to best practices. With features such as email services, cron job management, powerful Mongoose queries, auth middleware, and utility functions, Nodex aims to streamline the development process while maintaining clean and scalable code.
